column2: I chose a quinoa salad and the homemade potato chips seasoned with Old Bay seasoning.  I was trying to balance being healthy (quinoa) with wanting to be bad (potato chips).  Needless to say
column3: this was an excellent pairing and both were scrumptious.  The quinoa had chunks of squash and zucchini mixed in; it was zippy
column5: and crunchy.  The potato chips were gorgeously uneven in degrees of fried:  some were perfectly caramel while others were just shy of burnt.  Liberally seasoned
column6: this made for different and interesting flavor profiles.
